裙帶.definition: waistband of a skirt; (fig.) related to the wife or another female family member

裙帶官.definition: official who gained his position through the influence of a female relative

裙帶資本主義.pinyin: qun2 dai4 zi1 ben3 zhu3 yi4

裙帶關係.definition: (idiom) favoritism shown to sb because of the influence of the person's wife or other female relative; (idiom) (by extension) favoritism towards relatives, friends or associates

裙帶風.definition: the practice of favoring sb because of the influence of the person's wife or other female relative; (by extension) culture of favoritism towards relatives, friends and associates

裙邊.definition: the edible gelatinous fringe of a softshell turtle's carapace
